name: ONE [Demo]
description:
[FEEDBACK IS GREATLY APPRECIATED]

ONE is a challenging platformer game with some unique tricks up its sleeve.

It is designed to be a fair but challenging experience, that will probably make you mad.

This demo features the first 40 of the 100 levels that will be available in the full game, as well as one bonus level.

The full game is not yet out and may feature some changes from this version, however upon release it will be linked below:

[THIS IS WHERE THAT FULL GAME LINK WILL BE]

INSTRUCTIONS

Arrow Keys - move

Esc - return to menu

X - everything else

Controller is supported

Music was sourced from the following places:

http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Six_Umbrellas/Ad_Astra/
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Andrew_Codeman/Ice_Country
[Except the title screen music - that was made by me]

Join my discord: https://discord.gg/tkkS2M4
It's the best place to give feedback as I check it most often, and you also get to see the other projects i'm working on.

Recent updates: version 1.01
Level 13 nerfed
Bug involving the warp level fixed

version 1.05
level 4 nerfed
level 17 redesigned slightly
suicide spike added in level 33 and bottomless pit now kills you properl
bosses remove all threats from the stage on death
